definitions.definition: A person who acts in a disorderly manner.
Not in order; marked by disorder or disarray.
definitions.example: The books and papers are in a disorderly state.

definitions.definition: Not acting in an orderly way, as the functions of the body or mind.
Not complying with the restraints of order and law; unruly; lawless.
Offensive to good morals and public decency.
In a confused or lawless manner.
